project_abstract.cdata: The Railway Rehabilitation Project will support and deepen the restructuring process which the Railways and Government have initiated. The project supports a set of policy measures that will be embodied in new railway law, the Restructuring Action Plan and a Contract Plan with the Government. The project will finance necessary investments which will be in line with the restructuring concept and will help the railway through the restructuring process. This includes: (a) track renewal and maintenance on priority routes; (v) management information systems; (c) signalling and telecommunications; (d) traction and rolling stock improvements; (e) rehabilitation of passenger coaches; and (f) training and technical assistance.
